figures.imgAlt: Chapter navigation of the Salesforce eBook.
figures.figcaption: Sticky navigation for the chapters of this eBook feature at the top of the browser window. Clicking on one will scroll the user to the appropriate chapter and highlight it in the navigation.
Because of the hefty helping of content, we chose to implement accordions so that a user can toggle open and closed the information they want to read.
Character animations are encoded in both webm for modern browsers that support webm and its alpha channel, and as mp4 to gracefully downgrade for those that don't.
